resources.string: Welcome to the Discworld check list app
The image used as the app icon for this project is taken from the following website: http://niknaksoldpeculiarblog.blogspot.co.uk/2011/06/sir-terry-pratchett-more-on-choosing-to.html
The image used (what it\'s used for) for this project is take from the following website: http://theyoungtook.deviantart.com/art/A-Tuin-and-the-Disc-World-116371456
The list of books for this app was taken from a copy of \"Night Watch\" and verified against the list at the following website: http://discworld.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_Discworld_Books
